name: Now This is Pod Racing!
description:
The labels on the left represent the three guys who are betting. You need to click their button toggles to "choose them"

once you choose a guy, you can bet (by pressing the bet button) an amount of money, on a racer.

Racer 1 = Blue

Racer 2= Brown

Racer 3= Green

Racer 4= Red

once you bet, the labels will update to reflect the bet. Once you hit Race! the landspeeders take off
